 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָלַל‎</span>] **verb** ==tingle, quiver== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִלְצֵל‎</span> ***whirr*** (rare); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צְלַל‎</span>; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָֽלְלוּ‎</span> [[Hab.3.16|Hab 3:16]] ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּצִלֶּינָה‎</span> [[1Sam.3.11|1Sam 3:11]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּצַּלְנָה‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:67g»§ 67g</sup>) [[2Kgs.21.12|2Kgs 21:12]]; [[Jer.19.3|Jer 19:3]] — ***tingle***, of ears, at horrid sound [[1Sam.3.11|1Sam 3:11]]; [[2Kgs.21.12|2Kgs 21:12]]; [[Jer.19.3|Jer 19:3]] (all of dreadful news); of lips, ***quiver*** in terror [[Hab.3.16|Hab 3:16]].
